title: Ticket #2254: Windows MSI installer doesn't update admin email in the config file
description:
Mick Beaver at Disney says:

    When I used the Condor 7.6.1 MSI, it asked for the administrator's email address. I put in:

    mick.beaver@disney.com

    However, within the config file, it set CONDOR_ADMIN to root@$(HOSTNAME) (or maybe it was root@$(FULL_HOSTNAME), but you get the idea).

    My system is running Windows 7 64-bit. The RELEASE_DIR is C:\condor

    -Mick
remarks:
2011-Jun-20 15:30:13 by ziliang:
Matt changed the value of CONDOR_ADMIN and did not notify me of said change like I requested on this wiki page: https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/wiki?p=WindowsInstallerConfig

Fix is quick and should be in by the end of today or tomorrow, based on time testing privsep takes up.
